descriptionHtml:
This file needs
ECE [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/[/url]?
SG Hairpack 268 [url=http://pan.baidu.com/share/init?shareid=2660003940&uk=1325410909]http://pan.baidu.com/share/init?shareid=2660003940&uk=1325410909[/url]    password is k4wo
SG Female Textures ( I use CBBE ver.) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/[/url]?
The eyes of beauty [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/[/url]?
Sophia texture

and you have to install this order.

First. install ECE with NMM.
you have to choose Fullpackage, no cheeks fix -none, no vampire cheeks -none, silder 2x and Step 2x, High-res UV map

Second. install Sophia texture
CBBE: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/vw8cp1maphhb16i/cbbe.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/download/vw8cp1maphhb16i/cbbe.zip[/url]
UNP: [url=http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=96065&uk=488086290]http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=96065&uk=488086290[/url]

Third. install SG Female Textures
overwrite all files.
then lip color more colorful than before

4th. install The eyes of beauty

5th. install hairpack.
this CME file's set is SG hairpack's No.23 hair.





-2015.4.26.-
Please download fix ver.
:)
author: windofriver
